## type [Mailer](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/adapters/outbound/mailer/sendgrid/sendgrid.go#L15-L20>)

Mailer delivers transactional emails using SendGrid's v3 API Requires a valid API key and sender address configured upstream

```go
type Mailer struct {
    APIKey    string
    FromEmail string
    FromName  string
    Sandbox   bool
}
```
